title: Issuance locations response message schema
description: Issuance locations request should be done at least once a week on Mondays. Locations and codes change rarely. The provider of this service is SMIT. QTSP & Card manufacturer will do a weekly request. QTSP will ignore the notion of groupingCode and will only maintain issuanceLocations in the local database.

grouping.description: Some issuance locations are grouped together under one specific issuance location acting as a parent location. All Documents with the same groupingCode should be sent to groupingCode location. Not relevant for QTSP

reusable.description: Indication whether to use reusable or disposable security packages. FALSE for disposable security packages. Not relevant for QTSP. This field is used when groupingCode is not present.

code.description: Unique code of issuance location. Not relevant for QTSP.

name.description: Name of issuance location. Not relevant for QTSP.

reusable.description: Indication whether to use reusable or disposable security packages. FALSE for disposable security packages. Not relevant for QTSP.
